author: Turiya
title: Chennai Air bnb or home stay info needed
text: India Mike » India Travel » Cities in India » Chennai (Madras) » Chennai Air bnb or home stay info needed Chennai Air bnb or home stay info needed # 1 I will be visiting Chennai with my wife in November end for about 10 days and would like to see if Anyone has any experience -with Air bnb in Chennai? We routinely do that in USA and have had a great experience but we have not tried it in India so far. I checked on Air bnb website and found a few posting with good reviews but just wanted to check on this forum as well. If anyone has info about other non Air bnb home-stay - we are open. We are strict vegetarian so prefer similar host. Thanks.
